CustomField.formula: CCMI__Duration__c + /* Add 2 days for each full week */ (FLOOR(CCMI__Duration__c / 5) * 2) + /* Determine the day of the week that the task is scheduled to end on, and adjust for the next working day 5/6/7: Weekend, add an additional 2 days -1: Started Monday and duration in full weeks, subtract 2 extra days added from full week calculation */ CASE(MOD(CCMI__Start__c - DATE(1900, 1, 8), 7) + MOD(CCMI__Duration__c, 5) - 1, 5, 2, 6, 2, 7, 2, -1, -2, 0 )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The length of the Task when weekend days are taken into account.
CustomField.label: Calculated Duration
